subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Sasha Rearick is the new men’s Alpine coach of the United States Ski Team, replacing Phil McNichol. Rearick was the men’s slalom and giant slalom head coach. His promotion was announced at the United States Alpine Championships at Sugarloaf in Carrabassett Valley, Me.
